channel.title: Npc help
channel.description:
Major problem.
Everytime i teleport to Godwars the wizards attack you ( ALL OF THEM BOMBARDE YOU ) but, what i'm asking is how can i change the wizards to not attack you but they only attack you when you hit them.
Regards James

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

I had to get new replace the npc’s with others that looked like em’ in godwars you could replace the sara gods with other sara gods that just had different colored robes or something… and change the npc you have to kill to get godwars points in the client.java…
(I might need to make a tutorial on this… yeah, just wait until I make a tutorial and I’ll P.M. you when its done! ;D)

Read full topic
